snippet: "Well, 39 points in five days is a bit of a tough one to do," Rick Santorum told a scrum of reporters.
abstract: "Well, 39 points in five days is a bit of a tough one to do," Rick Santorum told a scrum of reporters.
lead_paragraph: NASHUA, N.H. -- Rick Santorum conceded Friday night that he was unlikely to win the New Hampshire primary on Tuesday, but said he was proud of the progress he had made.

headline.main: Santorum Concedes He Is Unlikely to Win in New Hampshire
